data.name: configuration1.ConfigurationString
data.value: [ {mode:"default", fields:[ {name:"id",displayName:"ID",type:"int",visible:false}, {name:"warehouseId",displayName:"仓库ID",type:"int",visible:false}, {name:"storageLocationId",displayName:"库位ID",type:"int",visible:false}, {name:"supplyId",displayName:"供货ID",type:"int",visible:false}, {name:"supplySerialNo",displayName:"供货序号",type:"string",editable:false}, {name:"supplierNo",displayName:"供应商代号",type:"string",association:"#supplierNoAssociation",editEnded:"#supplierNoEditEnded",editable:false}, {name:"supplierName",displayName:"供货商名称",type:"string",association:"#supplierNameAssociation",editEnded:"#supplierNameEditEnded",editable:false}, {name:"materialId",displayName:"物料ID",type:"int",visible:false}, {name:"materialNo",displayName:"物料代号",type:"string",association:"#materialNoAssociation",editEnded:"#materialNoEditEnded",editable:false}, {name:"supplierId",displayName:"供应商Id",type:"int",visible:false}, {name:"amount",displayName:"数量",type:"double",forwardMapper:"#AmountForwardMapper",editable:false}, {name:"availableAmount",displayName:"可用数量",type:"double",forwardMapper:"#AvailableAmountForwardMapper",editable:false}, {name:"unit",displayName:"单位",type:"string",editable:false}, {name:"unitAmount",displayName:"单位数量",type:"double",editable:false}, {name:"storageLocationNo",displayName:"库位编码",type:"string",association:"#storageLocationNoAssociation",editEnded:"#storageLocationNoEditEnded",editable:false}, {name:"storageLocationName",displayName:"库位名称",type:"string",association:"#storageLocationNameAssociation",editEnded:"#storageLocationNameEditEnded",editable:false}, {name:"batchNo",displayName:"批次号",type:"string",placeHolder:"留空自动生成",editable:false}, {name:"relatedOrderNo",displayName:"相关单号",type:"string",editable:false}, {name:"inventoryDate",displayName:"存货日期",type:"datetime",editable:false}, {name:"manufactureDate",displayName:"生产日期",type:"datetime",editable:false}, {name:"expiryDate",displayName:"失效日期",type:"datetime",editable:false,visible:false}, {name:"state",displayName:"检测状态",type:"int",defaultValue:2,forwardMapper:"#stateForwardMapper",backwardMapper:"#stateBackwardMapper",editable:false} ], httpAPIs:[ {type:"get-count",
